original_title: Disneyland Resort: Happiest Homecoming on Earth
overview: Enjoy and explore the magic and excitement of the Disneyland resort, The Happiest Place on Earth, in this 50 minute color video adventure. With two world famous theme parks, hotels, dining and shipping, the Disneyland resort has even more to offer! Yet is still possesses the nostalgic magic and charm as the park originally designed by Walt Disney himself.
title: Disneyland Resort: Happiest Homecoming on Earth
